What’s more, younger generations, who are most in need of real-world socialization, are affected more than anyone! We believe this damaging trend will only get worse without intervention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is the distribution of CryptiBIT tokens?" tab_id="1539789163723-9e3e8fce-e08007e5-2e05"][vc_column_text]Crypto is an ERC20 compliant token generated during our ICO. Crypto has a finite supply. Crypto enables its owners to support our vision by creating and curating challenges. Owners get rewarded based on the quality of their activity and their level of item.title: Identity Managements
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
Innovative financial & business ideas

Exhaustive accounting records regularly audited. Aims to comply with all applicable regulations and international laws. Built on Paymium’s proven security and technological record. A high level of digital asset protection and safe record of transactions.Built on fair-exchange protocols enabling cryptocurrency atomic swaps to mitigate counter-part risk. Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://wp.wp-preview.com/cryptibit/cryptibit-3.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection. An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year. If you have an account and you log in to this site, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue. For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Advisor" subtitle="OUR CORE" style="2" texttransform="none" fontweight="bold" fontsize="medium" color="custom" color_custom="#7a27f7" line="0"][vc_tta_accordion style="flat" gap="25" c_icon="chevron" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true" el_class="cryptibit-tta"][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-unlock-alt" add_icon="true" title="Growing Family" tab_id="1539789163449-692063c4-a5f8"][vc_column_text]Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs. New listing and market making services to foster enhanced token liquidity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-credit-card" add_icon="true" title="Excellent support" tab_id="1539789163586-a67902dd-5ee2"][vc_column_text]We use technology to feel connected without realizing that digital connections prove to be poor substitutes to real-life interaction. What’s more, younger generations, who are most in need of real-world socialization, are affected more than anyone! We believe this damaging trend will only get worse without intervention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-pencil-square-o" add_icon="true" title="Become an Investor" tab_id="1539789163723-9e3e8fce-e080"][vc_column_text]Crypto is an ERC20 compliant token generated during our ICO. Crypto has a finite supply. Crypto enables its owners to support our vision by creating and curating challenges. Owners get rewarded based on the quality of their activity and their level of engagement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1561624509945{padding-left: 15% !important;}" el_class="mobile-padding-inner-none"][mgt_images_slider_wp slider_images="2604,2599" slider_image_size="full" vertical="true" autoplay_speed="6000" arrows="false" css_animation="fadeIn"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" vc_row_bg_grad_style="top" vc_row_color_bggradfrom="#2c2a68" vc_row_color_bggradto="#2a104f" vc_row_bg_grad="true" css=".vc_custom_1561454942450{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="2612" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeIn"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1561454744321{padding-left: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://wp.magnium-themes.com/cryptibit/cryptibit-1/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/CryptiBIT-text.png?id=149) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}"][mgt_header_block_wp title="The Rise application" subtitle="The app that connects it all" style="2" texttransform="none" fontweight="bold" fontsize="medium" color="custom" color_custom="#7a27f7" line="0" css_animation="fadeInUp"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn" el_class="text-size-medium"]Built on Paymium’s proven security and technological record. About Us

Its main goal is to bring 200 million new retail investors to crypto by eliminating all fiat obstacles on the way to crypto.

[/mgt_promo_block_wp][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1489136895964{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_header_block_wp title="Blockchain Company Overview" subtitle="About us" style="2" texttransform="none" line_margin="small" line_color="#6d33e4" line_color_grad="#69d6d1" css_animation="none" line_grad="true"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" el_class="text-size-medium"]Built on proven security and technological record. item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1548410531111{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_promo_block_wp background_color="#ffffff" darken="darken" darken_overlay_color="#f4f4f4" darken_overlay_grad="left" darken_overlay_color_grad="rgba(242,250,252,0.9)" animated="1" animated_overlay_color="rgba(72,0,99,0.6)" block_height="350px" block_round_edges="large" css_animation="none" button_url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.wp-preview.com%2Fcryptibit%2Fcryptibit-3%2Fpricing%2F|title:Pricing%20list||" button_round_edges="full" button_align="left" button_text_size="small" icon_type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-video_library" hover_effect="icon-wobble-horizontal" button_color_bg="#6d33e4" button_color_bggrad="#69d6d1" format_h2_fontsize="45px" block_hover_shadow_effect="true" block_hover_effect="true" button_top_margin="true" button_icon="true" button_override="true" button_bg_grad="true" css=".vc_custom_1558443714198{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Inquiries

Its main goal is to bring 200 million new retail investors to crypto by eliminating all fiat obstacles on the way to crypto.

[/mgt_promo_block_wp][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1558443588882{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1558362147383{padding-right: 15% !important;}"][mgt_header_block_wp title="Inquiries" subtitle="Contact us" style="2" texttransform="subheader" line_margin="small" line_color="#6d33e4" line_color_grad="#69d6d1" css_animation="fadeInDown" line_grad="true"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInDown" el_class="text-size-medium" css=".vc_custom_1558443599398{padding-right: 10% !important;}"]Contact us with new business opportunities and speaker requests. For jobs, you can see our current openings on the careers page. For questions unrelated to hiring or new business opportunities, please reach out to us at hi@cryptibittheme.com[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1558443873983{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #f7fbfe !important;border-radius: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][contact-form-7 id="1615"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1558443588882{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1558362147383{padding-right: 15% !important;}"][mgt_header_block_wp title="Frequently Asked Questions" subtitle="Questions? We are Ready!" style="2" texttransform="subheader" line_margin="small" line_color="#2f9bea" line_color_grad="#75ceae" css_animation="none" line_grad="true"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInDown" el_class="text-size-medium" css=".vc_custom_1558443599398{padding-right: 10% !important;}"]Contact us with new business opportunities and speaker requests. For jobs, you can see our current openings on the careers page. For questions unrelated to hiring or new business opportunities, please reach out to us at hi@cryptibittheme.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1558442949486{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1548335476627{padding-right: 5% !important;}"][vc_tta_accordion style="flat" gap="25" c_icon="chevron" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true" el_class="cryptibit-tta"][vc_tta_section title="How can you describe CryptiBIT?" tab_id="1558442697772-dac4faea-5690"][vc_column_text]Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs. New listing and market making services to foster enhanced token liquidity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Where is your Company registered?" tab_id="1558442697817-9844dadb-3329"][vc_column_text]We use technology to feel connected without realizing that digital connections prove to be poor substitutes to real-life interaction. What’s more, younger generations, who are most in need of real-world socialization, are affected more than anyone! We believe this damaging trend will only get worse without intervention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is the distribution of CryptiBIT tokens?" tab_id="1558442697862-9b363f92-aed8"][vc_column_text]Crypto is an ERC20 compliant token generated during our ICO. Crypto has a finite supply. Crypto enables its owners to support our vision by creating and curating challenges. Owners get rewarded based on the quality of their activity and their level of engagement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How many Crypto tokens will be generated?" tab_id="1558442697910-72016dde-0467"][vc_column_text]A total of 3.560.000.000 will be generated. Upon completion of the ICO, no more Crypto tokens will be issued.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row vc_row_color_bggradfrom="#882afc" vc_row_color_bggradto="#224ba5" vc_row_bg_grad="true" css=".vc_custom_1560258234108{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;border-radius: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_calltoaction_block_wp background_color="" text_color="white" title="Start trading with One Wallet" css_animation="none" button_url="url:%23|title:See%20all%20features||" button_round_edges="full" button_text_size="small" button_text_transform="uppercase" button_icon_position="right" icon_type="entypo" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-right-open" hover_effect="grow" button_icon="true"]For anything else, please contact us – we would be delighted to help.[/mgt_calltoaction_block_wp][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: How it Works Alt
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1550065146087{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][mgt_promo_block_wp background_color="" darken="darken" darken_overlay_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.09)" darken_overlay_grad="top" animated="1" animated_overlay_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.56)" background_image_id="1305" coverimage="1" block_height="350px" block_round_edges="large" css_animation="none" button_url="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DZJhhk9dOF54|title:Presentation||" button_round_edges="full" button_align="left" button_text_size="small" icon_type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-video_library" hover_effect="icon-wobble-horizontal" button_color_bg="#6d33e4" button_color_bggrad="#69d6d1" background_image_enable="true" block_hover_shadow_effect="true" block_hover_effect="true" button_link_lightbox="true" button_top_margin="true" button_icon="true" button_override="true" button_bg_grad="true" css=".vc_custom_1560181488208{padding-right: 20% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Public documentation sufficiency

Its main goal is to bring 200 million new retail investors to crypto by eliminating all fiat obstacles on the way to crypto.

[/mgt_promo_block_wp][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1550049839961{padding-left: 6% !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]Built on CryptoIC0’s proven security and technological record. A high level of digital asset protection and safe record of transactions. Built on fair-exchange protocols enabling cryptocurrency atomic swaps to mitigate counter-part risk. Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]High availability and high scalability trade matching engine to sustain a deep orderbook on all pairs. Market, limit, stop loss, take profit and trailing stop orders. Self-cancelling and expiration orders. Dedicated staff available at any time to answer customer requests and solve issues experienced on the exchange.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1548065862117{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1489136895964{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1550048961338{padding-right: 15% !important;}"][mgt_header_block_wp title="How it Works" subtitle="OUR CORE" style="2" texttransform="none" fontweight="bold" line="0" css_animation="fadeInDown" css=".vc_custom_1550050063770{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vcw-price-label color="black" fullwidth="yes"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][vcw-price-label color="black" id="neo" fullwidth="yes"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][vcw-price-label color="black" id="ripple" fullwidth="yes"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][vcw-price-label color="black" id="monero" fullwidth="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" el_id="text-size-medium"]Institutional ICO & token listing. An ICO service going from planning and execution of ICO campaign to providing ICO token liquidity via listing on CryptiBIT at the outset of the ICO. Listing of currencies following a technical selection process.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]Built on CryptoIC0’s proven security and technological record. A high level of digital asset protection and safe record of transactions. Built on fair-exchange protocols enabling cryptocurrency atomic swaps to mitigate counter-part risk. item.title: Accordions
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1559743449999{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_header_block_wp title="Accordions" subtitle="Elements" style="2" align="center" texttransform="none" fontsize="large" line_margin="small" line_color="#2f9bea" line_color_grad="#75ceae" css_animation="none" line_grad="true"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1548416658796{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion style="flat" gap="25" c_icon="chevron" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true" el_class="cryptibit-tta"][vc_tta_section title="How can you describe CryptiBIT?" tab_id="1539789163449-692063c4-a5f8ac63-5cc8"][vc_column_text]Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs. New listing and market making services to foster enhanced token liquidity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Where is your Company registered?" tab_id="1539789163586-a67902dd-5ee2ac63-5cc8"][vc_column_text]We use technology to feel connected without realizing that digital connections prove to be poor substitutes to real-life interaction. What’s more, younger generations, who are most in need of real-world socialization, are affected more than anyone! We believe this damaging trend will only get worse without intervention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is the distribution of CryptiBIT tokens?" tab_id="1539789163723-9e3e8fce-e080ac63-5cc8"][vc_column_text]Crypto is an ERC20 compliant token generated during our ICO. Crypto has a finite supply. Crypto enables its owners to support our vision by creating and curating challenges. Owners get rewarded based on the quality of their activity and their level of engagement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How many Crypto tokens will be generated?" tab_id="1539789163876-70cfc132-fe57ac63-5cc8"][vc_column_text]A total of 3.560.000.000 will be generated. Upon completion of the ICO, no more Crypto tokens will be issued.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1561105266963{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion color="white" gap="25" c_icon="chevron" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true" el_class="cryptibit-tta"][vc_tta_section title="How can you describe CryptiBIT?" tab_id="1559551821520-ecac4c46-24c0"][vc_column_text]Advisory and technology services to execute third-party ICOs. New listing and market making services to foster enhanced token liquidity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Where is your Company registered?" tab_id="1559551821548-f5cebc26-d493"][vc_column_text]We use technology to feel connected without realizing that digital connections prove to be poor substitutes to real-life interaction. What’s more, younger generations, who are most in need of real-world socialization, are affected more than anyone! We believe this damaging trend will only get worse without intervention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is the distribution of CryptiBIT tokens?" tab_id="1559551821576-3905d386-4df9"][vc_column_text]Crypto is an ERC20 compliant token generated during our ICO. Crypto has a finite supply. Crypto enables its owners to support our vision by creating and curating challenges. Owners get rewarded based on the quality of their activity and their level of engagement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How many Crypto tokens will be generated?" tab_id="1559551821607-fe8012c2-6832"][vc_column_text]A total of 3.560.000.000 will be generated. Upon completion of the ICO, no more Crypto tokens will be issued.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1559742892585{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_header_block_wp title="Roadmap" subtitle="Elements" style="2" align="center" texttransform="none" fontsize="large" line_margin="small" line_color="#2f9bea" line_color_grad="#75ceae" css_animation="none" line_grad="true"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1539589497078{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}"][vc_column][mgt_timeline_wp title="Pre-seed Investment - $120.000" date_month="February" year_color="#211c1c" month_color="#797979" textblockborderstyle="rounded" text_bg_color="#f7fbfe" dots_position="bottom" line_color="#2062f2" url="" icon_color_bg="#2062f2" css_animation="none" icon_disable="true" block_shadow_effect="true"]Built on Crypto’s proven security and technological record. A high level of digital asset protection and safe record of transactions. High availability and high scalability trade matching engine to sustain a deep orderbook on all pairs.[/mgt_timeline_wp][mgt_timeline_wp title="Elaboration of Platform" date_month="April" year_color="#211c1c" month_color="#797979" textblockborderstyle="rounded" text_bg_color="#f7fbfe" dots_position="bottom" date_position="left" line_color="#2062f2" pointer_style="disable" url="" icon_color_bg="#2062f2" css_animation="none" icon_disable="true" block_shadow_effect="true"]Release Timeline Smart Contact framework and document draft. Deploy supporting modules (new opcodes) to testnet. Release of public testnet (sup port Javascript fo smart con tract).[/mgt_timeline_wp][mgt_timeline_wp title="Token Sale Phase" date_month="August" year_color="#211c1c" month_color="#797979" textblockborderstyle="rounded" text_bg_color="#f2f9f0" dots_position="bottom" line_color="#14d3b0" pointer_style="disable" url="" icon_color_bg="#14d3b0" css_animation="none" icon_disable="true" block_shadow_effect="true"]Token Sale starts. Pre-sale 1st August to 20 October. Start of Timeline wallet and tournament functionality development. Create the wallet (the user registered in the system gets the access to an Ethereum wallet that belongs to the system and is linked to the user.[/mgt_timeline_wp][mgt_timeline_wp title="Integration with Ethereum" year_color="#211c1c" month_color="#797979" textblockborderstyle="rounded" text_bg_color="#f9f9f9" dots_position="bottom" date_position="left" line_color="#f4f4f5" pointer_style="disable" url="" icon_color_bg="#f4f4f5" css_animation="none" icon_disable="true" block_shadow_effect="true"]Release the beta version of Timeline Marketplace website featuring a personal account without real processing. That will allow to test the features and basic user flow. The website version will include.[/mgt_timeline_wp][mgt_timeline_wp title="Timeline Wallet release" date_year="2019" date_month="March" year_color="#211c1c" month_color="#797979" textblockborderstyle="rounded" text_bg_color="#f9f9f9" dots_position="top" line_color="#f4f4f5" pointer_style="disable" url="" icon_color_bg="#f4f4f5" css_animation="none" icon_disable="true" block_shadow_effect="true"]Elaborate a technical card for blockchain transactions. Integrate blockchain technology into payment processing. Enable 2FA authentication. Implement a payment mechanism with a signature via 2FA. Introduce Timeline token to the main cryptocurrency exchanges[/mgt_timeline_wp][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: CryptiBIT wants to reshape your experience with cryptocurrencies
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
Secure storage of funds

One of the biggest challenges that most cryptocurrency holders face today is handling of private keys. Private keys are bits of data that give users ownership of their coins and enable them to make cryptocurrency payments. If you lose your private keys, or if someone steals it from you, you effectively lose the ownership of your coins without any recourse. Many cryptocurrency exchanges store private keys on your behalf. This certainly eases the experience by relieving you of the burden of handling private keys yourself. It also enables those exchanges to provide you with instant payments.

Adding liquidity to the landscape with easy-to-use trading tools

Users who want to invest in altcoins must usually juggle between various exchanges, which can become a frustrating and costly experience, especially for beginners and non-technical users. Crypto will be addressing this problem with a “protocol stack,” which is a support for interactions between the different technologies of the cryptocurrency landscape. For instance, with your Crypto wallet, you will be able to trade between different cryptocurrencies and altcoins as well as second-layer protocols such as the Bitcoin Lightning Network and Ethereum Raiden without the need to have in-depth knowledge of the underlying technologies.

item.title: The Braveheart effect: How companies profit off our desire for freedom
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
A new company aims to become the leading European exchange by placing emphasis on regulatory compliance. Another feature of the new exchange is the integration of decentralized features like atomic swaps to grant better privacy, lower cost and higher scalability. One of the biggest challenges that most cryptocurrency holders face today is handling of private keys. Private keys are bits of data that give users ownership of their coins and enable them to make cryptocurrency payments. If you lose your private keys, or if someone steals it from you, you effectively lose the ownership of your coins without any recourse. Many cryptocurrency exchanges store private keys on your behalf. This certainly eases the experience by relieving you of the burden of handling private keys yourself. It also enables those exchanges to provide you with instant payments.

Adding liquidity to the landscape with easy-to-use trading tools

Users who want to invest in altcoins must usually juggle between various exchanges, which can become a frustrating and costly experience, especially for beginners and non-technical users. Crypto will be addressing this problem with a “protocol stack,” which is a support for interactions between the different technologies of the cryptocurrency landscape. For instance, with your Crypto wallet, you will be able to trade between different cryptocurrencies and altcoins as well as second-layer protocols such as the Bitcoin Lightning Network and Ethereum Raiden without the need to have in-depth knowledge of the underlying technologies.

item.title: A new exchange gives priority to regulatory compliance and security
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
It has been a while now since cryptocurrencies and blockchain have been defined as transformative for finance and many more industries. Still, even after so many years since Bitcoin’s birth, regulation concerning the space remains unclear, and compliance isn’t taken for granted yet One of the biggest challenges that most cryptocurrency holders face today is handling of private keys. Private keys are bits of data that give users ownership of their coins and enable them to make cryptocurrency payments. If you lose your private keys, or if someone steals it from you, you effectively lose the ownership of your coins without any recourse. Many cryptocurrency exchanges store private keys on your behalf. This certainly eases the experience by relieving you of the burden of handling private keys yourself. It also enables those exchanges to provide you with instant payments.

Adding liquidity to the landscape with easy-to-use trading tools

Users who want to invest in altcoins must usually juggle between various exchanges, which can become a frustrating and costly experience, especially for beginners and non-technical users. Crypto will be addressing this problem with a “protocol stack,” which is a support for interactions between the different technologies of the cryptocurrency landscape. For instance, with your Crypto wallet, you will be able to trade between different cryptocurrencies and altcoins as well as second-layer protocols such as the Bitcoin Lightning Network and Ethereum Raiden without the need to have in-depth knowledge of the underlying technologies.

item.title: Making contracts more human: How to make paperwork painless
item.dc:creator: cryptoico
item.content:encoded:
It has been a while now since cryptocurrencies and blockchain have been defined as transformative for finance and many more industries. Still, even after so many years since Bitcoin’s birth, regulation concerning the space remains unclear, and compliance isn’t taken for granted yet

Templates should communicate clearly

One of the biggest challenges that most cryptocurrency holders face today is handling of private keys. Private keys are bits of data that give users ownership of their coins and enable them to make cryptocurrency payments. If you lose your private keys, or if someone steals it from you, you effectively lose the ownership of your coins without any recourse.

Many cryptocurrency exchanges store private keys on your behalf. This certainly eases the experience by relieving you of the burden of handling private keys yourself. It also enables those exchanges to provide you with instant payments.

Adding liquidity to the landscape with easy-to-use trading tools

Users who want to invest in altcoins must usually juggle between various exchanges, which can become a frustrating and costly experience, especially for beginners and non-technical users. Crypto will be addressing this problem with a “protocol stack,” which is a support for interactions between the different technologies of the cryptocurrency landscape.

For instance, with your Crypto wallet, you will be able to trade between different cryptocurrencies and altcoins as well as second-layer protocols such as the Bitcoin Lightning Network and Ethereum Raiden without the need to have in-depth knowledge of the underlying technologies.
